query:
WITH updates (id, value) AS (
        	SELECT id,value FROM aggregates
        	WHERE name = 'Uptime'
		    FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
        )
        UPDATE aggregates
        SET
            value = to_jsonb((COALESCE(NULLIF(aggregates.value, 'null'), '0')::text)::double precision + $1),
            updated_at = now()
        FROM updates
        WHERE aggregates.id = updates.id
